item.title: 土耳其向投资者发出的信息
item.description: Mehmet Simsek 的主张很简单：在经历了经济冒险主义和危机时代之后，土耳其的 "理性 "政策又回来了。这将使该国的里拉债务成为全球资金管理者的稳健赌注。【原文：Mehmet Simsek’s pitch is simple: “rational” policies are back in Turkey after an era of economic adventurism and crises. And that should make the country’s lira debt a sound bet for the world’s money managers.】

item.title: DoValue 与埃利奥特达成 4.5 亿欧元银行融资协议
item.description: 意大利金融服务专业公司 DoValue SpA 即将与多家银行达成协议，获得约 4.5 亿欧元（4.89 亿美元）的信贷额度，这是与 Elliott Investment Management 旗下 Gardant SpA 服务部门完成合并的关键一步。【原文：Italian financial services specialist DoValue SpA is close to an accord with a pool of banks for about €450 million ($489 million) in credit facilities, a key step to finalize a combination with Elliott Investment Management’s Gardant SpA servicing unit.】

item.title: 西姆塞克称创纪录的资金流入将瞄准土耳其长期债务
item.description: Mehmet Simsek 的主张很简单：在经历了经济冒险主义和危机时代之后，土耳其的 "理性 "政策又回来了。这将使该国的里拉债务成为全球资金管理者的稳健赌注。【原文：Mehmet Simsek’s pitch is simple: “rational” policies are back in Turkey after an era of economic adventurism and crises. And that should make the country’s lira debt a sound bet for the world’s money managers.】

item.title: 押注加拿大降息为落后银行带来希望
item.description: 多伦多海湾街（Bay Street）上上下下的投资者越来越多地押注加拿大将于 6 月份降息，这可能会提振加拿大长期受挫的银行股。【原文：Investors up and down Toronto’s Bay Street are increasingly betting on a June rate cut in Canada, potentially giving a boost to Canada’s long-suffering bank stocks.】

item.title: 莫桑比克连续第三次降低利率
item.description: 莫桑比克中央银行响应国际货币基金组织进一步放宽货币政策的呼吁，今年连续第三次降息，成为非洲第一个降息的国家。【原文：Mozambique’s central bank became the first in Africa to cut rates for a third straight time this year, heeding a call from the International Monetary Fund to further ease monetary policy.】

item.title: 世界上任职时间最长的中央银行行长将在罗马尼亚获得新任期
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行行长穆古尔-伊萨雷斯库（Mugur Isarescu）是世界上任职时间最长的央行行长。【原文：Romania’s Mugur Isarescu, the world’s longest-serving central bank governor, is poised to be confirmed for a new five-year term as lawmakers seek a vote on the extension by the end of June.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行加息尚未完全显现
item.description: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲央行史无前例的货币紧缩政策的全面影响尚未显现；即使官员们正在为 6 月份降低借贷成本做准备。【原文：The full impact of the European Central Bank’s unprecedented monetary-tightening campaign is yet to be felt — even as officials gear up to lower borrowing costs in June, Chief Economist Philip Lane said.】

item.title: 津巴布韦称 60% 的人口在三月前需要粮食援助
item.description: 津巴布韦表示，在厄尔尼诺天气现象导致旱灾后，该国玉米作物（南部非洲国家的主食）绝收，900 万人（超过该国人口的一半）将需要粮食援助，直至 3 月份。【原文：Zimbabwe said 9 million people — more than half of its population — will need food aid until March after the El Niño weather phenomenon resulted in a drought that decimated the nation’s corn crop, a staple in the southern African country.】

item.title: 印度重申雨量充沛的季风预报将促进农作物生长
item.description: 印度仍预测季风将高于正常水平，这将提振该国水稻、大豆和棉花等作物的前景，因为雨水是该国近一半农田的主要灌溉来源。【原文：India maintained its prediction for an above-normal monsoon, boosting prospects for crops such as rice, soybeans and cotton in a country where rain is the main source of irrigation for almost half of the farmland.】

item.title: 加纳将利率维持在 29% 左右，以支撑不断下跌的塞地
item.description: 加纳银行维持基准利率不变，以支持其遭受重创的货币并遏制通货膨胀。【原文：The Bank of Ghana left the benchmark interest rate unchanged to support its bruised currency and contain inflation.】

item.title: 欧洲股票估值低廉阻碍首次公开募股
item.description: 投资者表示，欧洲中型股票以低廉的估值水平交易，阻碍了一些估值较高的私营公司跳槽上市。【原文：European mid-sized stocks trading at cheap valuation levels is discouraging a number of more richly valued private companies from making the jump and listing on exchanges, investors say.】

item.title: 摩根大通称必和必拓计划面临 43 亿美元南非资金外流风险
item.description: 根据摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A successful takeover of Anglo American Plc under the arrangements BHP Group has offered could lead to outflows of $4.3 billion from South Africa, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. analysis.】

item.title: 外部缓冲薄弱，惠誉将孟加拉国降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周一下调了孟加拉国的主权评级，理由是该国的外部缓冲能力持续减弱，有可能使这个南亚国家更容易受到冲击。【原文：Fitch Ratings downgraded Bangladesh’s sovereign rating on Monday, citing sustained weakening of the country’s external buffers, which risks making the South Asian nation more vulnerable to shocks.】

item.title: 据说韦丹塔考虑最快于 6 月出售 10 亿美元股票
item.description: 印度大宗商品大亨阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）的韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）正在考虑在未来几周内出售股份，知情人士透露，这次出售可能会筹集多达 850 亿卢比（10 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Indian commodities tycoon Anil Agarwal’s Vedanta Ltd. is considering a share sale as soon as the coming weeks that could raise as much as 85 billion rupees ($1 billion), people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 上海降低住房首付，宽松政策向大城市蔓延
item.description: 金融中心上海降低了首付比例和最低抵押贷款门槛，中国的大城市纷纷跟进中央政府对房地产行业的援助。【原文：The financial hub of Shanghai lowered downpayment ratios and the minimum mortgage threshold, as bigger Chinese cities follow through on the central government’s aid for the property sector.】

item.title: Stellantis 考虑为意大利增加两款车型以化解争论
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Stellantis NV 公司将提议在意大利再生产两辆混合动力汽车，这是菲亚特制造商在考虑将部分生产转移到成本更低的国家时安抚当地政界人士的举措之一。【原文：Stellantis NV will propose building two more hybrid vehicles in Italy, according to people familiar with the matter, part of a bid to appease local politicians as the Fiat maker eyes moving some production to lower-cost countries.】

item.title: 陷入困境的房东 SBB 大幅削减 56 亿美元债务
item.description: 陷入困境的房东 SBB 与投资公司 Castlelake LP 达成了第二笔融资协议，以避免资金紧张，这凸显了瑞典商业房地产行业仍然岌岌可危的状况。【原文：Struggling landlord SBB struck a second financing deal with investment firm Castlelake LP as it seeks to stave off a funding crunch that underscores the still precarious state of Sweden’s commercial real estate industry.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司和能源部门寻求董事会批准融资 20 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）帝国的旗舰公司及其电力公司正在重新制定计划，将在 2025 年 3 月前筹集多达 20 亿美元的资金，因为该企业集团正在加大资本支出。【原文：The flagship firm of billionaire Gautam Adani’s empire and his power utility are renewing plans to raise as much as $2 billion by March 2025, according to people familiar with the matter, as the conglomerate steps up capital spending.】

item.title: 贸易紧张推动货运价格上涨，速度之快令人想起科维德 "混乱 "时期
item.description: 全球货物贸易在经历了去年的低迷之后出现了加速增长的迹象，这推高了运费，也让一些供应链管理者回想起三年前扰乱国际商务的需求激增。【原文：Global goods trade is showing signs of accelerating after last year’s slump, pushing up shipping rates and giving some supply-chain managers flashbacks to the demand spike that disrupted international commerce three years ago.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为未来存在风险，Ionos 失去全购地位
item.description: Ionos SE 作为全买入评级股票的日子已经结束了。【原文：Ionos SE’s days as an all buy-rated stock are over.】

item.title: RWE 将在德国沿海建造两个风电场
item.description: 德国最大的电力生产商 RWE AG 不顾供应链方面的持续挑战，做出了在北海建设 1.6 千兆瓦海上风力发电能力的最终投资决定。【原文：Germany’s largest power producer RWE AG took the final investment decision to construct 1.6 gigawatts of offshore wind capacity in the North Sea, despite persistent supply-chain challenges.】

item.title: Discovery 以更低利率进军南非房贷市场
item.description: Discovery Ltd.的银行部门正在南非推出一款房贷产品，通过其活力奖励计划，客户可以少付高达 1%的房贷，并动态降低利息还款额。【原文：Discovery Ltd.’s banking unit is rolling out a mortgage product in South Africa that will enable clients to pay as much as 1% less on their home loans and lower interest repayments dynamically through its Vitality rewards program.】

item.title: 马克龙和肖尔茨计划联合推动加强欧洲防空能力
item.description: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰之后，欧洲人受到压力，要求他们对自身安全做出承诺，法国和德国将于本周公布加强合作的计划，以加强欧洲的防空能力。【原文：France and Germany are aiming to unveil plans this week for closer cooperation to strengthen Europe’s air defenses as they respond to pressure for Europeans to commit to their own security after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 现代汽车为可能创纪录的印度 IPO 增加更多银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，现代汽车公司已邀请科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. ）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）担任其印度分公司潜在首次公开募股的顾问，因为该汽车制造商正在考虑在这个南亚国家进行有史以来规模最大的一次上市。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. has brought in Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. and Morgan Stanley as advisers on a potential initial public offering of its India unit, according to people familiar with the matter, as the automaker considers what might be one of the biggest-ever listings in the South Asian country.】

item.title: 德国商业前景改善，经济势头增强
item.description: 德国的商业前景连续第四个月上升，因为人们对该国经济的反弹将在今年余下的时间里得到加强充满信心。【原文：Germany’s business outlook rose for a fourth month as confidence builds that the country’s economic rebound will strengthen over the rest of the year.】

item.title: 国际金融公司为南非 FirstRand 公司提供 2.5 亿美元绿色住房贷款
item.description: 世界银行的私人投资部门将向南非贷款机构 FirstRand Ltd. 提供 2.5 亿美元贷款，以帮助增加绿色建筑贷款。【原文：The World Bank’s private investment arm will provide a $250 million loan to South African lender FirstRand Ltd. to help boost loans for green buildings.】

item.title: 加密货币交易商关注以太币创纪录以及美国 ETF 炒作带来的波动性上升
item.description: 在美国监管机构出人意料地转向允许数字资产交易所交易基金之后，人们对以太币涨势的押注正在加剧，尽管人们对这种产品的需求强度还存有疑问。【原文：Bets on more Ether gains are intensifying following a surprise US regulatory pivot toward allowing exchange-traded funds for the digital asset, even as questions swirl about the strength of demand for the products.】

item.title: 英美休市，欧洲股市交投清淡
item.description: 欧洲股市在清淡的交易日中基本持平，英国和美国市场因假期休市。【原文：European stocks were largely flat in a light trading day with markets in the UK and US closed for holidays.】

item.title: 基金看淡中国股市为反弹留有余地
item.description: 策略师们表示，今年全球基金对中国股票的持股比例仍然偏低，这为他们在经济前景改善时增持中国股票铺平了道路。【原文：Global funds have retained a small underweight allocation on Chinese shares this year, paving the way for them to boost their holdings as the economic outlook improves, strategists say.】
